verses.text: Now it came to pass, when \w Adoni-zedek|strong="H0139"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, and had utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* it; as he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* and her \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, so he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* and her \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; and how the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* had made \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and were \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them;

That they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, because \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \add was\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and because it \add was\add* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* than \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* thereof \add were\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft royal…: Heb. cities of the kingdom\f*

Wherefore \w Adoni-zedek|strong="H0139"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Hoham|strong="H1944"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and unto \w Piram|strong="H6502"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, and unto \w Japhia|strong="H3309"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and unto \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto me, and \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me, that we may \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*: for it hath made \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Therefore the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, they and all their \w hosts|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* before \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, and made \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against it.

¶ And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Slack|strong="H7503"\w* not thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to us \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us, and \w help|strong="H5826"\w* us: for all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* are gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* against us.

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, he, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with him, and all the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* them not: for I have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; there shall not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of them \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

\w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* therefore \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto them \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*, \add and\add* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w discomfited|strong="H2000"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* them with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, and \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* them along the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that goeth \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them to \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*, and unto \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*.

And it came to pass, as they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add and\add* were in the going \w down|strong="H4174"\w* to \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* upon them unto \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*, and they \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: \add they were\add* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* which \w died|strong="H4191"\w* with \w hailstones|strong="H1259"\w* than \add they\add* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

¶ Then \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* delivered \w up|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Sun|strong="H8121"\w*, stand thou \w still|strong="H1826"\w* upon \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*; and thou, \w Moon|strong="H3394"\w*, in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Ajalon|strong="H0357"\w*.  +  r 10.12  t stand…: Heb. be silent *

And the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* stood \w still|strong="H1826"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w*, until the \w people|strong="H1471"\w* had \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* themselves upon their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*. \add Is\add* not \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w Jasher|strong="H3477"\w*? So the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w hasted|strong="H0213"\w* not to go \w down|strong="H0935"\w* about a \w whole|strong="H8549"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft Jasher: or, the upright?\f*

And there was no \w day|strong="H3117"\w* like that \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it or \w after|strong="H0310"\w* it, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.
But these \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* themselves in a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* at \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* are \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* in a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* at \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Roll|strong="H1556"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* upon the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w set|strong="H6485"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* by it for to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* them:

And \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* ye not, \add but\add* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and smite the \w hindmost|strong="H2179"\w* of them; \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* them not to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.19 \ft smite…: Heb. cut off the tail\f*

And it came to pass, when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w slaying|strong="H5221"\w* them with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*, till they were \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, that the \w rest|strong="H8300"\w* \add which\add* \w remained|strong="H8277"\w* of them \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* at \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: none \w moved|strong="H2782"\w* his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* against \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* those \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* unto me out of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*.

And they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so, and brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* those \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* unto him out of the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, \add and\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*.

And it came to pass, when they brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* those \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, that \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w captains|strong="H7101"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* which \w went|strong="H1980"\w* with him, Come \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w put|strong="H7760"\w* your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* upon the \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* of these \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*. And they came \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* upon the \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* of them.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*: for thus shall the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to all your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* against whom ye \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* them, and \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* them on \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*: and they were \w hanging|strong="H8518"\w* upon the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* until the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the going \w down|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \add that\add* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and they took them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* off the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them into the \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* wherein they had been \w hid|strong="H2244"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in the \w cave’s|strong="H4631"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \add which remain\add* until this \w very|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof he utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w*, them, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein; he \w let|strong="H7604"\w* none \w remain|strong="H8300"\w*: and he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w* as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

Then \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* from \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, unto \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* it also, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein; he \w let|strong="H7604"\w* none \w remain|strong="H8300"\w* in it; but \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* from \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, unto \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against it, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it on the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein, according to all that he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*.

¶ Then \w Horam|strong="H2036"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*; and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, until he had \w left|strong="H7604"\w* him none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*.

¶ And from \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* unto \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him; and they \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against it, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it:

And they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein he utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, according to all that he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, unto \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; and they \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it:

And they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein; he \w left|strong="H7604"\w* none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*, according to all that he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*; but \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* it utterly, and all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein.
¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, to \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*; and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it:

And he \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof; and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein; he \w left|strong="H7604"\w* none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*: as he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, so he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof; as he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* also to \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*, and to her \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

¶ So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, and of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and of the \w vale|strong="H8219"\w*, and of the \w springs|strong="H0794"\w*, and all their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: he \w left|strong="H7604"\w* none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*, but utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* all that \w breathed|strong="H5397"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them from \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w* even unto \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and all the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, even unto \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

And all these \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* and their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* did \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w* at \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.
